headline: US fintech firm Broadridge to boost India headcount by 26% in 3 years, top exec says
summary: BENGALURU - U.S. fintech firm Broadridge Financial will expand its India tech staff by 26% to 6,800 people over three years as it gears up to sell its products in the world's most populous nation,...
